Articles.Content: ...Basically, how do you get this thing to work? I'm running A Mac, OS 10.7, and KSP 20.2. I DLed MapSat, I -think- I installed it properly, then sent it to orbit. I got a fuzzy image when I started it, now nothing. Wonder what I did wrong?

...Basically, how do you get this thing to work? I'm running A Mac, OS 10.7, and KSP 20.2. I DLed MapSat, I -think- I installed it properly, then sent it to orbit. I got a fuzzy image when I started it, now nothing. Wonder what I did wrong?

You have an outdated version. You need to get the 4.1x dev build here.
